subject: Re: Question for everyone
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
A lot of times the things i'm thinking do come through onto the radio 
broadcast.  If i think of a question they answer even though i didn't 
say anything.  But Evp's can be interpreted differently by everyone 
too, mostly people think they hear different things at the same time 
which is frustrating to get a clear answer.  I think that is what we 
are doing here on this board, to keep trying to eventually get a clear 
answer that nobody can argue that it said that.  Better boxes, Better 
theories and ideas on communication, we have a long way to go.  But 
those who stay with it will get the ultimate reward and silence the 
skeptics.

-Steve H.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "delchay2005" <azredant@...> wrote:
>
> I will be condicting some EVP experiments next month in a very 
haunted 
> location.
> 
> What does everyone think about the theory that some EVP's are 
> generated by the human brain? Could this be possible?
> 
> Thanks,
> 
> 
> James
>
